name: LocalVocal
0:
”Alexa, open Local Vocal”
”Alexa, start Local Vocal”
”Alexa, ask Local Vocal”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: local vocal
Developer Terms of Use
des: Local Vocal designs voice skills for small and medium businesses. Our Amazon Alexa skill provides information on our services, our team, and how to get in contact with us. It also contains voice app design tips, helping brands to better navigate and educate themselves about this exciting new opportunity to communicate with customers.
